Adult individuals diagnosed with acute myocardial infarction, stroke, suicide, <e1>suicide</e1> attempt, fall injury, or that suffered a road traffic crash from 01.10.2006 for <e2>bupropion</e2>, or from 01.03.2008 for varenicline, until 31.12.2013 were included.
